articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Study confirms White Sands footprints are ~23,000 years old - Ars Technica
articles.description: Results are consistent with two earlier studies dating the footprints to between 22,000 and 24,000 years ago.

articles.title: Midjourney launches its first AI video generation model, V1 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Midjourney launched its much anticipated AI video generation model, V1, on Wednesday and laid out a roadmap for its future releases.
articles.content:
Midjourney, one of the most popular AI image generation startups, announced on Wednesday the launch of its much-anticipated AI video generation model, V1.

articles.title: Marina Mabrey’s foul on Caitlin Clark upgraded to Flagrant-2, AP source says - AP News
